tonegod.gui.controls.windows

Class TabControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jme3.scene.Spatial
      • com.jme3.scene.Node
        • tonegod.gui.core.Element
          • tonegod.gui.controls.windows.TabControl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.jme3.asset.CloneableSmartAsset, com.jme3.collision.Collidable, com.jme3.export.Savable, com.jme3.util.clone.JmeCloneable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public abstract class TabControl
extends Element
    Implements a tab control in which combinations of a tab button and a panel can be added.

    At least one tab panel must be added before trying to display the control [use addTab(String) functions]. The panel can be a classic panel or a scrollable panel. Children can be added using addTabChild(int, Element).

                  com.jme3.math.Vector4f resizeBorders,
                  java.lang.String defaultImg)
        Creates a new instance of the TabControl control
        Parameters:
        screen - The screen control the Element is to be added to
        position - A Vector2f containing the x/y position of the Element
        dimensions - A Vector2f containing the width/height dimensions of the Element
        resizeBorders - A Vector4f containg the border information used when resizing the default image (x = N, y = W, z = E, w = S)
        defaultImg - The default image to use for the TabControl background

      • TabControl

        public TabControl(ElementManager screen,
                  java.lang.String UID,
                  com.jme3.math.Vector2f position,
                  com.jme3.math.Vector2f dimensions,
                  com.jme3.math.Vector4f resizeBorders,
                  java.lang.String defaultImg,
                  Element.Orientation orientation)
        Creates a new instance of the TabControl control
        Parameters:
        screen - The screen control the Element is to be added to
        UID - A unique String identifier for the Element
        position - A Vector2f containing the x/y position of the Element
        dimensions - A Vector2f containing the width/height dimensions of the Element
        resizeBorders - A Vector4f containing the border information used when resizing the default image (x = N, y = W, z = E, w = S)
        defaultImg - The default image to use for the TabControl background
        orientation - which orientation to use

        public Element getTab(int index)
               throws java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
        Get the tab panel element by its index.
        Parameters:
        index - Index of the tab panel element.
        Returns:
        The tab panel element with the given index of the tab control.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - If no tab panel exists at index.
        Since:
        0.2
